promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic bird psychic-type pokemon wearing a regal mask. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Mystiplume, a a chibi young basic bird psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Psyshot. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "psychic" or "Mystiplume". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, bird-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Chirping from cave crevices, Mystiplume uses Psyshot to echolocate its path. Its mind-empowered wings flutter in harmonic melody of life.
